SELECT board_no, nick, ttl, cntn, drwup_dt, inq,rcom, common_cd, ctgr FROM( SELECT rownum rn,board_no, nick, ttl, cntn, drwup_dt, inq,rcom, common_cd, ctgr FROM( SELECT board_no, nick, ttl, cntn, drwup_dt, inq,rcom, common_cd, ctgr FROM COMMON_CODE JOIN (SELECT board_no, nick, ttl, cntn, drwup_dt, inq,rcom, common_cd FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (memb_no) WHERE rcom>=#{rcom} AND common_cd LIKE #{commonCd}||'%') USING (common_cd)
ORDER BY drwup_dt DESC
ORDER BY inq DESC, drwup_dt DESC
ORDER BY rcom DESC, drwup_dt DESC
ORDER BY drwup_dt DESC
)
WHERE rownum<=(${page}*10)
) where rn > (${page}-1)*10
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE common_cd LIKE 'C1%' ORDER BY drwup_dt DESC ) WHERE rownum<=6
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE common_cd LIKE 'C2%' ORDER BY drwup_dt DESC ) WHERE rownum<=6
SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM BOARD WHERE rcom>=#{rcom} AND common_cd LIKE #{commonCd}||'%'
SELECT common_cd,ctgr FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE common_cd LIKE #{commonCd}||'0%'

SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(h_comm_no, 5)) sort_h_comm, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(comm_no, 5)) sort_comm,comm_no,board_no,cntn,drwup_dt,rcom,nrcom,h_comm_no,memb_no,nick FROM COMMENTS JOIN MEMBER USING (memb_no) WHERE board_no=#{boardNo} ORDER BY sort_h_comm, sort_comm
SELECT comm_no,board_no,cntn,drwup_dt,rcom,nrcom,h_comm_no,memb_no,nick FROM COMMENTS JOIN MEMBER USING(memb_no) WHERE comm_no=#{commNo}
